reference.title: eucadw-import-data
reference.shortdesc: Imports data into the data warehouse. This data is in a specified file that has first been generated from the eureport-export-data command.

row.entry: Name of the export file you want to import into the data warehouse.
Use this option if you want to replace an existing file that has the same name as the file you are importing.

section.title: Output
section.p: Eucalyptus returns a message detailing the number of entries imported and the timefrome of those entries.

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: eucadw-import-data -e iReport.dat -p mypassword Imported 45 entries from 2012-11-07 23:08:17 to 2012-11-07 23:37:59
